title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2831.3 - Selection process
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2831.3 - Selection process

State Regulations
(a) Applications
must be completed in full. Incomplete applications will be returned and will
not be considered in the funding cycle. (b) Each application submitted in response to
requests for proposals will be reviewed to determine compliance with the
eligibility provisions of this Subchapter. (c) Each application that satisfies the
eligibility provisions of this Subchapter will be evaluated and
ranked. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2831.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
